subject: Music
title: Freddie Mercury: The Showman
description: Learn Freddie Mercury: The Showman in one minute.

hook.text: Freddie Mercury could hold 72,000 people in the palm of his hand with just his voice.

buildup.text: Born Farrokh Bulsara in Zanzibar, he reinvented himself as rock's greatest frontman.

discovery.text: Bohemian Rhapsody fused rock, opera, and ballad into six minutes that defied every radio rule.

twist.text: His Live Aid performance in 1985 is considered the greatest live rock performance ever filmed.

climax.text: His four-octave voice was studied by scientists who found his vocal cords vibrated uniquely.

punchline.text: He didn't perform for crowds. He made crowds perform for him.

quiz.question: What made Bohemian Rhapsody revolutionary?
options: It fused rock, opera, and ballad in a six-minute epic
